Command.Name: echoCommand
Command.Description: Echos back whatever is input to the command.

Command.Name: version
Command.Description: Displays the current version of the application.

Command.Name: about
Command.Description: Displays the about message for the current application.

Command.Name: name
Command.Description: Displays a message with the name of the current application.

Command.Name: clearScreen
Command.Description: Clears the screen of any extra data by pushing lots of empty strings past the cache of the console system.

Command.Name: help
Command.Description: Displays all of the commands names and descriptions.

Command.Name: workflowHelp
Command.Description: Displays all the workflows, names and values.
